attributes.action: Represent the people as democratically elected governments are meant to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To often the government including oppposition parties have rode roughshod over the majority of the populations opinion, good examples include the war in Iraq, the proposed road charging, the mishandling of pensions, council tax, inheritance tax, stamp duty on housing, to name but a few. 
Democracy such as ours includes ELECTED people who represent the people and their views, not an elected body who make their own decisions.
At times it is difficult to please everyone but recently the government has made decisions that the majority of the population do not agree with.
Bring back democracy!
